sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_app_eng_studio.ApplicationInventoryListBuilder</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Builder object that contructs an inventory of decorated files for a given application Sys ID</description>
        <name>ApplicationInventoryListBuilder</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ApplicationInventoryListBuilder = (function() {	
	return {
		build: function(applicationSysId) {
			AccessValidator.verifyApplicationAccess(applicationSysId);
			
			var applicationInventory = ApplicationsDataModel.generate(applicationSysId);
			
			applicationInventory["taxonomy_categories"] = new TaxonomyCategoriesDataModel().generate();
			applicationInventory["taxonomy_definitions"] = new TaxonomyDefinitionsDataModel().generate();
			applicationInventory["files"] = FileDataBuilder.build([applicationSysId]);
			applicationInventory["details"] = AppDetailsBuilder.build(applicationSysId);

			return applicationInventory;
		}
	};
	
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-17 20:31:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8e25ee5353223010fe92ddeeff7b12a9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ApplicationInventoryListBuilder</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="App Engine Studio" source="sn_app_eng_studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="App Engine Studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8e25ee5353223010fe92ddeeff7b12a9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-17 20:31:21</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
